summary: experts say the meteor weighed 100,000 tonnes and was 55 feet wide .   the rock created a 50-foot hole in a frozen lake near chelyabinsk .   scientists say they have located 53 tiny fragments of the meteor .   stones have magnetic field and emit unusually high traces of radiation .
